metadata.title: Are there any products with smaller memory capacity than RL78/G23?

sections.content:
Question:
Are there any products with smaller memory capacity than RL78/G23?
Answer:
Of course, we have a product group called "RL78/G22" with a similar concept as RL78/G23 but smaller code flash memory of 64KB and less. Furthermore, we also have other RL78 product groups which have smaller memories than RL78/G23, but with different special features, peripherals, pin counts, etc.
Please refer to the following URL for details:
RL78/G22 - General-Purpose Microcontrollers with Excellent Low-Power Performance and Rich Capacitive Touch Channels | Renesas
RL78 Family Portfolio:
RL78 Low Power 8 & 16-bit MCUs | Renesas
Suitable Products
RL78/G23, RL78/G22
